name: Medival Reclaim
description:
𝕸𝖊𝖉𝖎𝖊𝖛𝖆𝖑 𝕽𝖊𝖈𝖑𝖆𝖎𝖒 ~ 𝕬 𝕲𝖆𝖒𝖊𝕵𝖆𝖒 𝕾𝖈𝖔𝖗𝖊𝕾𝖕𝖆𝖈𝖊 𝖜𝖔𝖗𝖐

Medieval Reclaim is a speedrun game. Get as many points as you can as fast as you can!

Climb the castle wall to reclaim your throne!

Controls:

Click the climbing points!

Team:
